name: Flappy Euro Bird 2016
description:
The Euro bird accompanies you through the Euro 2016.
Get the most points and be the champion of your friends.
Do not forget! Collect the Balls!
With it, you choose your bird!

Choose the bird of your team.
We have them all ... France, Italy, Spain, Wales, Germany, England and many more.

Have fun with it...
dapion team
